short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block distracting websites and help you stay focused on your work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app helps you focus on your work. You can add a url to the block list. When you open a url added to the block list, the page will be redirected to the home page. You can remove a url from the list anytime.
